meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN - Park and Recreation Board Room and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street

agenda_items.title: Approval of Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the November 21, 2024, Arts and Culture Advisory Commission meeting minutes.

agenda_items.title: Recommendation of Selection Panelists
agenda_items.description: Vote to recommend new selection panelists to the Office of Arts and Culture’s Public Art Review Panel Roster.

agenda_items.title: Sidewalk Poetry Public Art Project
agenda_items.description: Recommendation in support of the initiation of the City-Wide, Sidewalk Poetry Public Art Project, to begin in the Esperanza District located in Council District 11.

agenda_items.title: FY 2023-24 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Recommendation in support of the Arts and Culture Advisory Commission’s FY 2023-24 Annual Report.

agenda_items.title: Cultural Organizations Program Guidelines
agenda_items.description: Recommendation in support of the FY 2025-26 Cultural Organizations Program (COP) Guidelines.

agenda_items.title: Additional Panelists Recommendation
agenda_items.description: Vote to recommend additional panelists to the Office of Arts and Culture’s Funding Programs Review Panel Roster.
